help.title: Available commands
help.description:
Prefix: `{{prefix}}`
Type `{{prefix}}help [command name]` for command specific information.

user.noteDesc: While the user appears to be whitelisted, it does not mean the user is safe all the time.
user.dangerousDesc: {{memberName}} is dangerous! We suggest to monitor his actions.

author.dangerousDesc: Your account is dangerous!! Leave now!

user.reportedOneTime: This user has been reported {{count}} time
user.reportedMultipleTimes: This user has been reported {{count}} times
user.reportedNever: This user have never been reported

report.noArgs: Please give the user's id to report!
report.reportFailed: Report failed. DDUB didn't receive the request!
report.alreadyReported: This user has been already reported within the 10 minutes!

token.noArgs: This command allows you to set your own DDUB Token to use to report users. Insert your token and you will able to report whitelabeled.
